backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing a social app backend with user creation, post creation (with optional base64 image), banana reactions, and follow/unfollow functionality using in-memory Maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming that the logo/Om symbol was removed from the Navigation component and replaced with plain text branding.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of frontend source file paths to short summaries describing each file's role and recent changes in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS with OKLCH CSS custom property tokens for light and dark themes covering background, foreground, card, sidebar, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point titled 'Banana Social App' that mounts the React app via a root div and a module script pointing to src/main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for `/feed` and `/profile/$userId`, a root layout wrapping all routes, and a redirect from `/` to `/feed`.
frontend/src/components/ComposePost.tsx: Post composition component with a textarea, character counter, image attachment (1 MB max, JPEG/PNG/GIF/WebP), base64 preview with removal, and submission passing both content and base64 image to the parent callback.
frontend/src/components/CreateProfileMod: Modal dialog for new users to enter a username and pick an avatar emoji, with validation and error display, calling a `createUser` callback on submit.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: App footer displaying the current year, banana emoji branding, and a caffeine.ai attribution link with UTM parameters.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper that renders Navigation at the top, a flexible main content area, and Footer at the bottom in a full-height flex column.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Sticky navigation bar with plain text 'BananaSocial' branding, a Feed link, and a Profile link (shown when the principal is available) using TanStack Router typed routing.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Renders a single post card with author avatar, username, content, optional image, timestamp, and a banana reaction button with optimistic animation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Custom hook that fetches the currently authenticated user from the backend and exposes a mutation to create a new user profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider, wrapping DFINITY's AuthClient to expose login, logout, and identity state to the React component tree.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for posts and users, including fetching, creating, reacting to posts, and following/unfollowing users with optimistic updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, Tailwind imports, and a full set of CSS custom properties for the Banana Social light and dark themes including typography, color tokens, and shadow utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Main feed page that displays posts with their authors, a compose box, a banner, and conditionally shows a create-profile modal for new users.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: React page component that displays a user's profile, their posts, and follow/unfollow controls, fetching data via custom query hooks and resolving the user by Principal ID from the route params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme tokens (banana color palette, fonts, shadows, border radii, animations) and enabling typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata file tracking version, existing features, and configuration for a task to remove the logo graphic from the navigation component and replace it with plain text branding.
